translation.en: [narrator] Bill writes code for days without sleep.
translation.zh: ‎比尔连续写代码 几天没有睡觉

translation.en: But instead of going to bed, he needs to blow off steam.
translation.zh: ‎但他没去补觉 而是选择去发泄一下

translation.en: Hitting the desert roads of Albuquerque at night,
translation.zh: ‎他开车来到阿尔伯克基的沙漠公路上

translation.en: he drives faster and faster...
pushing the limits of his car...
and the law.
-[computer beeps] -Hello, I'm Bill Gates.
In this video, you're going to see the future.
translation.zh: ‎在这段视频中 你将看到未来

translation.en: -[announcer] Mr. Bill Gates. -[applause]
[news anchor] Forbes Magazine calls Gates America's richest person.
translation.zh: ‎《福布斯》杂志称盖茨是美国首富

translation.en: [anchor 2] Six point three billion dollars.
-[anchor 3] Worth 40 billion dollars. -[anchor 4] One hundred billion dollars.
translation.zh: ‎他的身价达到400亿美元 ‎1000亿美元

translation.en: [man 1] Bill Gates is one of the most remarkable people...
-[woman 1] Arrogant. Greedy. -...I've ever met.
-[man 1] Predatory, capitalistic brainiac. -[woman 1] A devil.
translation.zh:
‎-贪婪 魔鬼
‎-损人利己的资本主义者 智商极高

translation.en: Impatient optimist.
-[man 2] Your brain is a CPU? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你的大脑是个中央处理器？
‎-是啊

translation.en: [woman 2] He thrives on complexity.
translation.zh: ‎越复杂的东西 越让他兴奋

translation.en: [woman 3] He's the smartest person I've ever met.
translation.zh:
‎-他是我见过的最聪明的人
‎-厉害！

translation.en: [man 3] He did drop out of college.
You guys never understood the first thing about this.
[anchor 5] Greatest American businessman of his generation.
translation.zh: ‎他那一代人中最伟大的美国商人

translation.en: [woman 4] He was changing the world with software.
[anchor 6] Is Bill Gates stifling technological innovation?
translation.zh: ‎比尔盖茨在扼杀技术创新吗？

translation.en: They're supposed to be jealous, supposed to be agitated.
translation.zh: ‎他们应该嫉妒 他们应该受刺激

translation.en: [man 4] Bill wants people to think that he's Edison
translation.zh: ‎比尔希望人们把他看成爱迪生

translation.en: -and he's really Rockefeller. -I'm done.
translation.zh:
‎-实际上他是洛克菲勒
‎-我受够了

translation.en: [man 4] If he were Edison, he'd be less dangerous.
translation.zh: ‎（语法错误 请联系系统管理员） ‎如果他是爱迪生 也不至于这么危险

translation.en: [woman 5] Can I just ask you one more question?
[man 6] Will the real Bill Gates...
-[cartoon] Damn, Bill. -...please stand up?
[narrator] When Bill Gates stepped down from Microsoft in 2008,
translation.zh: ‎当比尔盖茨2008年从微软引退时

translation.en: he was worth more than 58 billion dollars.
He built that fortune thinking about computer software,
translation.zh: ‎他能够发家致富 全靠研究电脑软件

translation.en: operating systems, spreadsheets,
and the Internet.
So in August 2012,
what was on his mind?
[director] So basically, we loop around this way.
translation.zh: ‎基本来说 我们会来回逛这条路

translation.en: [Bill] Okay, good.
There's a lot of spider webs up here.
Melinda always has me go first 'cause she doesn't like cobwebs.
translation.zh:
‎梅琳达总让我先走
‎因为她不喜欢蜘蛛网

translation.en: And I don't mind cobwebs.
[director] I first met Bill when I was at a film screening.
translation.zh:
‎我是参加电影放映时
‎第一次见到比尔的

translation.en: I walked over to introduce myself and noticed he was reading.
translation.zh: ‎我走过去自我介绍 发现他正在看书

translation.en: I looked closer and realized it was a Minnesota state budget
translation.zh:
‎我仔细一看
‎发现是明尼苏达州的预算

translation.en: that he was combing over line by line.
In his tote bag... were 37 other budgets.
translation.zh: ‎在他的手提包里 还有37份其他预算

translation.en: Immediately I wondered, who is this guy?
translation.zh: ‎我立刻想 这家伙到底是什么人？

translation.en: [director] What's your favorite food?
-Hamburger. -[director] What's your favorite animal?
Dog.
[director] What's your favorite animal that you eat?
Cow.
-[director] What do you eat for breakfast? -Nothing.
-[director] Favorite snack? -Nuts.
-[director] Coffee or tea? -Way more coffee.
translation.zh:
‎-咖啡还是茶？
‎-肯定更偏向咖啡

translation.en: [director] What is your worst fear?
I don't want my brain to stop working.
[director] Even before he left Microsoft in 2008,
Bill and his wife and partner Melinda
were already building what's now the world's largest foundation.
translation.zh: ‎已经建立了当今世界上最大的基金会

translation.en: They spend nearly five billion dollars a year,
work on US public education,
women and family planning.
They get antiviral drugs to HIV patients,
translation.zh: ‎他们帮助HIV患者服用抗病毒药物

translation.en: vaccines to the poorest kids.
But what I really wanted to know...
what does Bill actually do?
[woman] Eight o'clock,
Artificial Intelligence Tech Review,
nine o'clock, TerraPower meeting,
10:30, Microsoft board of directors,
half an hour lunch, he'll call with Warren Buffett,
translation.zh:
‎半小时午餐
‎会打电话给沃伦巴菲特

translation.en: 12:30, sanitation meeting,
an education strategy review,
interview with a journalist.
And then at the end of the day, he'll go over to the IV lab
translation.zh: ‎最后 他会去高智实验室

translation.en: and spend some time there.
[director] Is he on time?
He is on time to the minute every single meeting without fail.
translation.zh: ‎他每次开会都准时到 从不迟到

translation.en: Time is the one commodity that he can't buy more of.
translation.zh: ‎时间是他无法买到更多的商品

translation.en: It's a limited resource.
It's finite.
He's got the same 24 hours in a day that the rest of us have.
translation.zh: ‎他跟我们一样 一天也只有24小时

translation.en: [woman] I watch him sometimes do his best thinking when he's walking.
translation.zh: ‎我看他走路时 有时会尽力思考

translation.en: In our family space at home there's a place I will sit down,
translation.zh: ‎在我们家里 我会坐在一个地方

translation.en: and if he's working on something,
he will pace back and forth.
It helps him somehow organize his brain.
[Bill] You have to pick a pretty finite number of things
translation.zh: ‎你必须选择有限的一些事情

translation.en: to tell your mind to...
work on.
You have to decide...
what should you care about?
You know, what you'd really like is for all the children of the world
translation.zh: ‎我真正想要的 是世界上所有的孩子

translation.en: to be treated equally.
[director] What strikes me is how optimistic you are.
Do you think that was just physiological?
Or is that just like your chemistry?
[Bill] It must be.
When I was very young,
they nicknamed me Happy Boy.
translation.zh: ‎他们给我起外号 叫快乐宝宝

translation.en: I had an older sister who didn't, you know, beat me up or anything.
translation.zh: ‎我有个姐姐 她从来不会打我

translation.en: [woman] He did smile all the time.
My first memories of him are... he and I would go
translation.zh: ‎我对他最初的记忆 是他和我…

translation.en: and spend like a night or the weekend at my grandmother's house.
translation.zh: ‎会去祖母家过夜 或者过周末

translation.en: And we would play, um, sort of like make-believe,
like kids would play, we'd make houses and whatever.
translation.zh:
‎就像大多数孩子那样
‎我们会盖房子什么的

translation.en: My brother would always be the dog.
[Kristi] He was sort of a towhead,
translation.zh: ‎他的头发是金色的 总是脏兮兮的

translation.en: smiley little... kid.
[director] It was an early morning when Bill and Melinda read a story in the paper
translation.zh:
‎一天清晨
‎比尔和梅琳达在报纸上读到一段故事

translation.en: that would change the course of their foundation.
translation.zh: ‎改变了他们基金会的发展方向

translation.en: [man] The point of my article was to remind people
translation.zh: ‎我的这篇文章 是想提醒人们

translation.en: that kids around the world are dying
for reasons that are entirely preventable
translation.zh: ‎而死亡的原因 是完全可以避免的

translation.en: just because they happen to be born in Niger and not New York.
translation.zh:
‎只是因为他们出生在尼日尔
‎而不是纽约

translation.en: We saw this article and I remember saying to Bill, "This is unbelievable.
translation.zh:
‎我们看到这篇文章
‎我记得我对比尔说 “太难以置信了

translation.en: People are still dying of diarrhea.
How could that be?"
Because by then, we had a young daughter.
translation.zh: ‎因为那时 我们有一个女儿了

translation.en: And I knew if this child that I'm holding had diarrhea,
translation.zh: ‎我知道 如果这孩子患上痢疾

translation.en: I'd go to the pharmacy, I'd go to the doctor.
translation.zh: ‎我会去药房 我会去找医生

translation.en: If I was a mom in the developing world...
translation.zh: ‎如果我是一个发展中国家的母亲…

translation.en: ...this child might not make it.
And you can feel, I think, as a parent,
translation.zh: ‎你可以想象到 作为一个家长

translation.en: that capacity of how tragic that would be
and how needless and senseless.
Just because the world won't focus on it. Are you kidding me?
translation.zh:
‎只是因为世界没有去关注
‎这是开玩笑吗？

translation.en: We had made the commitment that the vast resources
translation.zh: ‎我们做出承诺 要将微软的大量资源

translation.en: from Microsoft will go back to society.
But what this article did for us
is it really got us thinking about global health and what could you do?
translation.zh:
‎让我们开始思考全球健康问题
‎以及能做些什么

translation.en: [Nicholas] I-- They had started philanthropy.
translation.zh: ‎他们当时已经在做慈善事业了

translation.en: They were providing computers in southern Africa.
And it was kind of frustrating. Didn't really feel like it was very effective.
translation.zh: ‎但不是很有效果 有点令人沮丧

translation.en: They were searching around for new issues.
translation.zh: ‎他们曾在四处寻找新的问题

translation.en: And the most important article I've ever written for that reason. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎这是我写过的最重要的一篇文章

translation.en: [Melinda] Bill went on to read the World Development Report
translation.zh: ‎比尔接着读了《世界发展报告》

translation.en: about how many kids
are dying of diarrhea.
[Bill] At the time this book comes out,
twelve percent of all kids... die before the age of five.
Three million times a year,
parents are burying children because of diarrhea.
And in the world that I'm spending time in,
I've never met a single parent
who had to bury a child because they died of diarrhea.
So it makes you wonder, hey, is the world applying
translation.zh: ‎这让我不禁去想 这个世界…

translation.en: its incredible set of resources
to eliminate these deaths?
[director] What I think is a miracle is that...
a thousand influential people have this book but never read it.
translation.zh:
‎上千名有影响力的人都有这本书
‎但是从未读过

translation.en: You happen to be one of the most influential people and you've read it,
translation.zh:
‎你碰巧是最有影响力的人之一
‎而且读过这本书

translation.en: and you understood it,
and you decided, okay, this is the action I wanna take.
translation.zh: ‎然后你决定 好吧 我要采取行动

translation.en: Yeah, this book would sit on a lot of shelves.
translation.zh: ‎是的 很多人都不会读这本书

translation.en: -It's-- It's not-- -[director laughs]
-[Bill] It's not a page-turner. -[laughing]
[automated voice] Eight plus four.
Four plus nine.
Twenty plus two.
-[record static] -Nine plus seven.
Seven plus five.
[director] Do you remember the day when you realized
that you were smarter than other kids your age?
[automated voice] Three plus six. Ten plus two.
[Bill] They used to have these records they'd put on,
and a voice that would say,
like "13 plus 18."
And I'd write the answer down,
look at other students.
The recording would go fairly quickly.
Thirteen plus 18.
Seventeen plus nine.
Ten plus 32.
And so as I'd write the answers down, you could see people kinda going...
translation.zh: ‎我写下答案时 看到其他孩子说…

translation.en: "Ah! This is too fast."
So I had a sense that my mind was snappy
translation.zh: ‎所以我意识到 我的头脑很敏捷

translation.en: on, you know, simple addition type things.
[director] And by 8th grade you take this math test, and you do best in the state.
translation.zh:
‎八年级时 你参加数学比赛
‎成绩是全州最好的

translation.en: [Bill] Yeah.
[director] And not just best in the state from 8th graders.
You did best in the state from every
translation.zh: ‎你比那些九年级 十年级

translation.en: eighth, 9th, 10th, 11th, and 12th grader.
translation.zh: ‎十一年级 十二年级的学生都厉害

translation.en: That's pretty mind-blowing.
Which parent pushed you to be the best?
[Bill] My mom.
[Bill] My mom was very engaged
in all of our day-to-day activity.
My-- My dad was amazing as a role model,
but the person who tried to get me excited about things, that was...
translation.zh: ‎但是一直试图激发我兴趣的人

translation.en: very dominated by my mom.
[woman] She was very warm.
She had a very good sense of how to make people feel comfortable.
She was very socially skilled and...
translation.zh: ‎她的社交能力很强 而且…

translation.en: not in a fake way, in a very genuine way.
translation.zh: ‎不是虚情假意的 而是真情实意的

translation.en: She cared about people and was interested in people.
[Bill] This is my mom.
This is actually some early medical stuff
translation.zh: ‎其实这是一些早期的医疗器械

translation.en: being displayed at this university that my mom must have...
been involved with somehow.
She was very big in the social scene in the Seattle area.
translation.zh: ‎她在西雅图地区的社交圈里很有名气

translation.en: [Kristi] She was on a lot of volunteer boards
translation.zh: ‎她是很多志愿者委员会的成员

translation.en: and did that kind of thing with United Way
and that ability to be a good board member
translation.zh: ‎成为一名优秀的董事会成员

translation.en: then got her other positions on boards that actually-- that paid.
translation.zh: ‎让她得到了其他董事会的带薪职位

translation.en: [Bill] The university, the insurance company, the phone company...
translation.zh: ‎大学 保险公司 电话公司…

translation.en: There's certainly no doubt that my involvement in the community
has had a tremendous impact on the business career
that I now have as well.
[Libby] That was my mom.
Suit on, put together,
translation.zh: ‎她会西装加身 穿戴整齐

translation.en: briefcase, walking out the door to a meeting.
translation.zh: ‎拿着公文包 出门去开会

translation.en: There was a newspaper article and there was this photograph of a boardroom table,
translation.zh:
‎这是一篇报纸文章
‎还有一张会议桌的照片

translation.en: and my mom was the one woman sitting at the table.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈是唯一一个坐在桌旁的女人

translation.en: [Kristi] I think we always had the impression
that she expected us to succeed, to be successful.
She'd talk about, "Oh, those parents must be proud their kid's doing that,"
translation.zh:
‎她会说 “那些父母一定为他们的孩子
‎这样做感到自豪”

translation.en: or, "Those parents must feel a little bad their kid's not doing that."
translation.zh:
‎或者“那些父母一定会很难过
‎因为他们的孩子没有那样做”

translation.en: She had a certain sense of values
that were...
uh... communicated to us in that kind of indirect way.
[Kristi] She was a force.
And she wanted
our family to be a force.
[Nicholas] I did reporting in both Africa and India,
translation.zh: ‎我在非洲和印度都做过报道

translation.en: and I remember in India at one point
I had to pee, and so I asked the woman I'd just been interviewing,
translation.zh:
‎我想小便 于是我问一个女人 ‎我刚刚采访过她的家人
‎采访了几个小时

translation.en: the family I'd just spent several hours with,
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚采访过她的家人
‎采访了几个小时

translation.en: "So, you know, where can I pee?"
translation.zh: ‎我问她 我在哪里可以小便？

translation.en: And she pointed me somewhere and I realized it was taking,
translation.zh: ‎她给我指了一下路 我意识到

translation.en: it was taking the urine in this gutter
to where they were collecting their water to drink.
People were defecating in the same spot.
[director] In many developing countries,
people choose to go outside because they can't stand using a pit latrine,
translation.zh:
‎人们选择随地排便
‎因为他们无法忍受使用坑式厕所

translation.en: a hole in the ground that has a terrible smell and often overflows.
translation.zh:
‎就是地上的一个洞
‎气味难闻 经常溢出

translation.en: For half the world's population,
translation.zh: ‎对于世界上一半的人口来说

translation.en: more than four billion people,
there is no good option.
[woman] There's a whole area of global development called WASH.
translation.zh: ‎有一个全球发展的评价叫做WASH

translation.en: So WASH stands for water, sanitation and hygiene.
translation.zh: ‎WASH代表水、环境卫生和个人卫生

translation.en: Most philanthropies that work in that space of water, sanitation, and hygiene,
translation.zh:
‎大多数在水、环境卫生和个人卫生
‎领域的慈善机构

translation.en: work on water.
Like you hear a ton about water, everybody's into water.
translation.zh:
‎你会听到许多水的问题
‎大家都关心水

translation.en: People say, "Oh, we need clean water." Well...
translation.zh: ‎人们会说“我们需要干净的水源”

translation.en: yes, the water should be clean,
but you can give people clean water.
If their kids are playing in mud that has human sewage in it,
translation.zh:
‎但如果孩子
‎在含有人类污水的泥浆中玩耍

translation.en: that's where all the diarrheal infection is taking place.
[Sue] Very few philanthropies
work on sanitation.
So sanitation is two main things:
toilets and sewer systems.
They are both areas where there's been a nearly complete lack of innovation.
translation.zh: ‎这两方面几乎完全缺乏创新

translation.en: [director] So Bill went looking for people who could apply a new way of thinking
translation.zh:
‎所以比尔去寻找
‎能够运用新思维方式的人

translation.en: to the problem.
He called mechanical engineer Peter Janicki.
translation.zh: ‎他联系机械工程师彼得贾尼基

translation.en: [Peter] I have never thought about sanitation.
I thought about a lot of other things.
[director] If you visit Peter's aerospace company,
translation.zh: ‎如果你参观彼得的航空公司

translation.en: there's a lot of technology in warehouses you're not allowed to see.
translation.zh: ‎仓库里有很多技术 是不对外展示的

translation.en: Here, they build top secret parts for the military and more.
translation.zh:
‎在这里
‎他们为军队和其他机构建造绝密部件

translation.en: [Peter] So when Bill first came to me,
and said, "Are you interested in working on this sanitation problem?"
translation.zh: ‎他说“你有兴趣解决卫生问题吗？”

translation.en: I thought to myself,
"What sanitation problem?
If there's anything that we've solved, in my opinion, it's sanitation."
translation.zh:
‎在我看来
‎卫生问题早就已经解决了呀”

translation.en: [director] Most of us don't think about what happens after we flush.
translation.zh:
‎大多数人不会去想
‎冲完水之后会发生什么

translation.en: Clean water fills the bowl, dirty water gets flushed.
Flushed water travels through a complex network of pipes
translation.zh: ‎冲走的水通过复杂的管道网络

translation.en: and arrives at a treatment center.
There, the water goes through things like a grit chamber...
translation.zh: ‎在那里 脏水会通过砂砾室

translation.en: ...gravity belt thickener, and a sludge digester.
translation.zh: ‎重力带式浓缩机 污泥消化池

translation.en: All to produce safe water.
You start looking at the United States and the population,
translation.zh: ‎如果你去看美国 ‎看看美国人口 美国面积很大

translation.en: it's a big country,
translation.zh: ‎看看美国人口 美国面积很大

translation.en: and there's actually not that many people live here.
translation.zh: ‎其实没有那么多人住在这里

translation.en: Three hundred million people in America.
Then you start looking at these other countries.
They have ten times the population density that we have.
translation.zh: ‎他们的人口密度是我们的十倍

translation.en: And everybody wants to do what we're doing.
translation.zh: ‎每个人都想做我们正在做的事情

translation.en: [Bill] If you build slums without putting the piping in,
translation.zh: ‎如果建造没有下水道的贫民窟

translation.en: going back in, getting the water,
building the piping,
it would be tens of billions for a single city
translation.zh: ‎对一个城市来说 需要数百亿美元

translation.en: to go in and build up modern sanitation.
It is not a system that will ever scale down to very poor countries.
translation.zh: ‎不是说贫穷的国家就能减少系统规模

translation.en: [director] Even if they could afford to modernize,
translation.zh: ‎即使他们能够负担建设费用

translation.en: that solution requires way too much energy and water.
translation.zh: ‎这种解决方案也需要很多能源和水源

translation.en: So we have a pit in the ground that smells so bad
translation.zh: ‎所以要不就在地上挖洞 臭气熏天

translation.en: that it makes you wanna throw up
or we have multi-million dollar waste water treatment plants.
translation.zh: ‎要不就花几百万美元 建污水处理厂

translation.en: Those are our two solutions. We're like, "Okay, this is the way it is.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们的两种方案
‎我们会觉得 “实际情况就是这样

translation.en: Get used to it."
[director] Bill wondered what it would take
to reimagine both toilets and sewage systems.
translation.zh: ‎才能重新设计厕所和污水处理系统

translation.en: [Bill] What if you can fund inventors
that could come up with something that's a tenth the cost?
translation.zh: ‎去发明成本只有十分之一的方案

translation.en: You know, that's pretty magical.
And you end up saving millions of lives.
translation.zh: ‎那样能拯救数百万人的生命

translation.en: [man] When I was six years old...
I can still remember my dad
telling me about the death of one of my brothers.
translation.zh: ‎他跟我说 我的一个兄弟去世了

translation.en: And then, at nine years old,
two more.
And then later,
one more.
I was big enough to understand what it means to lose...
translation.zh: ‎我当时已经长大了 懂得失去兄弟…

translation.en: to lose siblings.
And...
yeah.
[Doulaye] I eventually end up going to the university.
I started learning why people die.
That was the time I realized, yeah,
people die because of very preventable diseases.
It was like a hit.
I was lucky. I was still alive.
So...
What could I do?
[director] Doulaye left his village in Côte D'Ivoire
translation.zh: ‎杜莱离开了他在科特迪瓦的村庄

translation.en: and moved to Belgium to study sanitary engineering.
translation.zh: ‎搬到比利时 学习卫生工程

translation.en: But at the university, he realized that everyone talked about improvements
translation.zh: ‎但在大学里 他意识到大家谈论的

translation.en: that would only work in developed countries.
translation.zh: ‎是只有在发达国家才行得通的改进

translation.en: I could never imagine those things working in the places I was coming from.
translation.zh:
‎我无法想象
‎这些东西在我的家乡能起作用

translation.en: I had started really questioning all the professors.
And asked them, "Can you create new solution?"
translation.zh: ‎问他们“你能想出新的解决方案吗？”

translation.en: [director] For a decade, Doulaye couldn't find anyone willing to answer that question.
translation.zh:
‎十年来
‎杜莱找不到愿意回答这个问题的人

translation.en: And then, he got an email,
inviting him to meet Bill at the foundation.
The only thing I knew was...
he started Microsoft, he was very successful.
translation.zh: ‎微软是他创立的 他非常成功

translation.en: Why in the world someone like this want to talk about
fecal sludge, pit latrine, and toilet?
[director] Finally, Doulaye found someone in the western world
translation.zh:
‎最终 杜莱在西方世界
‎找到了这样一个人

translation.en: who understood what he knew from experience.
translation.zh: ‎能够理解他通过亲身感受体会的东西

translation.en: [Doulaye] It was the first time in my life
translation.zh: ‎在我生命中 这是第一次

translation.en: that conversation was not about whether it is difficult to solve.
translation.zh: ‎谈话的主题 ‎不是是否很难解决

translation.en: The conversation was about why it doesn't work.
What have you tried?
What have we never dared to try?
[director] Bill and Doulaye spent hours posing all sorts of questions.
translation.zh:
‎比尔和杜莱花了几个小时
‎提出各种各样的问题

translation.en: Could a toilet not only collect waste,
but turn it into fuel?
Would burning poop inside the toilet
create enough energy for it to run itself?
translation.zh: ‎是否能提供足够能量 供其自身使用

translation.en: Would it be possible for a toilet to work
without pipes or even outside water?
[Doulaye] We came to a conclusion that...
it would be possible.
[director] Bill knew there was still one big question left to answer.
translation.zh: ‎比尔知道 还有一个问题要回答

translation.en: How could he transform their scribbles on a whiteboard
into something that actually works?
[Lauren] Measure What Matters,
The Vaccine Race,
Haiti Prioritizes,
Blockchain Revolution, Strength in Stillness,
Inventions That Changed the World,
How to Make a Mind, Fundamentals of Deep Learning...
translation.zh: ‎《如何创造思维》《深度学习基础》

translation.en: -[paperbacks thump] -...Quantum Mechanics and Algorithms,
The Book of Why, Bad Blood,
Life 3.0...
Educated,
To Be a Machine,
The Perfect Weapon...
Elastic.
[director] And how often are you packing this?
This gets refreshed on a weekly basis.
It gets packed and cleaned for every trip he does, certainly,
translation.zh: ‎他每次出差都会收拾好这些

translation.en: because he has more time to read
while he's traveling for his work for the foundation.
-So this goes everywhere with him? -This goes everywhere with him.
[man] He is joyous about learning things,
like no one I've ever met in my life.
He doesn't read one book about something,
translation.zh: ‎对于一个话题 他不是读一本书

translation.en: he'll read, like, five books about something.
Most of which are too dense for any mortal to read, right?
translation.zh:
‎大多数书籍都很深奥
‎一般人都读不懂

translation.en: And he reads really fast and synthesizes really well.
translation.zh: ‎他阅读速度很快 理解能力也很好

translation.en: The most amazing thing is
he almost always knows more
than the other person he's talking to about whatever it is, it's unbelievable.
translation.zh: ‎他总是能懂得更多 很不可思议

translation.en: [man 2] When I've been with him on vacation, he'll read 14 books.
translation.zh: ‎我们一起度假时 他读了14本书

translation.en: That's a gift, you know, to read 150 pages an hour.
translation.zh: ‎一小时读150页 这是一种天赋

translation.en: I'm gonna say it's 90 percent retention.
Kind of extraordinary.
[Melinda] One thing about Bill is he is a multi-processor.
He'll be reading something else but then processing at the same time.
translation.zh:
‎他在读些其他东西时
‎也同时也在处理

translation.en: And when he's off reading, you think,
translation.zh: ‎当他不读书的时候 你会觉得

translation.en: "Hey, you could have gone to bed an hour earlier,"
that's actually when he's working out some of his emotional life.
translation.zh: ‎但实际上 他在处理一些情感生活

translation.en: [director] What do you remember about him?
I remember thinking:
-he's kind of weird. -[laughs]
And his friends are weird.
They're kind of nerdy
and they think differently than me.
My brother was happy to be locked in his room for hours
translation.zh: ‎他喜欢被锁在房间里几个小时

translation.en: focusing on one thing or another.
When you're ten and you're walking into his room, what do you see?
translation.zh:
‎你十岁时 走到他的房间
‎会看到什么？

translation.en: Um, I see a mess.
I see a mess, a total mass, books all over the place.
translation.zh: ‎绝对是一团糟 各处都摊着书

translation.en: I think left to his own devices,
he might have stayed in his room
and read books all day long.
[Kristi] You could just see that he was different.
translation.zh: ‎你可以看到 他非常不同

translation.en: I don't think he perceived himself as being different.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得 他不认为自己与众不同

translation.en: I don't know how much he was in touch with what was...
more normal,
just 'cause he was so introverted.
[director] He wants to be in his room and do what?
[laughs] Chew pencils.
[Kristi] He was just thinking.
-[pages flutter] -Pondering.
My mom had a hard time getting him to do things.
translation.zh: ‎为了让他做点事情 我妈没少费力气

translation.en: They had a really rocky relationship.
-[knocking] -She couldn't get to him.
[Bill] My parents' authority seemed arbitrary.
I really didn't want to follow their rules.
translation.zh: ‎我不是很想遵守他们的要求

translation.en: I would not speak for days at a time.
I felt like I was in some struggle.
[director] Does Bill get frustrated?
[Sue] Oh, yes.
Yeah, he's fierce, he is fierce.
It's scary. I mean, he gets like really frustrated.
translation.zh: ‎他那样很可怕 他会特别沮丧

translation.en: [director] Bill wrote to the most prestigious universities
translation.zh: ‎比尔给最负盛名的大学写信

translation.en: asking them to think about fixing the world's toilet problem...
translation.zh: ‎让他们考虑解决厕所的问题…

translation.en: so that together they could begin saving lives.
Most didn't bother to reply.
[Sue] When he's frustrated, it's,
-"Let's go faster." -[Bill exhales evenly]
translation.zh: ‎他会说 我们加快速度吧

translation.en: "Let's solve the problems.
And let's figure out what's between us and victory."
translation.zh: ‎让我们想想 距离胜利还差什么

translation.en: [director] What is the longest you've played on a single day?
translation.zh: ‎你一天最多运动了多长时间？

translation.en: Oh, eight hours.
-Eight hours? -Eight or nine.
What's the hottest you've played, what temperature you've played in?
translation.zh: ‎你运动的时候 最高气温是多少？

translation.en: A hundred and six.
Who first taught you how to play tennis?
Uh, my parents.
In the summers we played.
We came up and went to Hood Canal and...
They wanted us to do all the sports,
translation.zh: ‎父母希望我们进行各种运动

translation.en: so even baseball,
swimming... [lightly pants]
...football.
[director] Favorite memory from Camp Cheerio.
translation.zh: ‎琪瑞夏令营最好的回忆是什么？

translation.en: [Bill] Uh, you know, having my dad...
who's the mayor...
lead the singing march.
We had a lot of songs, but the theme song was
translation.zh: ‎我们有很多歌 但是主题曲是…

translation.en: from the...
Bridge Over the River Kwai song, it was...
translation.zh: ‎桂河大桥的歌 唱起来是…

translation.en: -[director] Why do you love that so much? -[Bill laughs]
[Bill] Well, just because I was a kid and those were good times.
translation.zh: ‎因为我那时还小 那段时光很美好

translation.en: [Kristi] We'd go with nine or ten different families
translation.zh: ‎我们会跟九到十个家庭一起

translation.en: and we'd rent out the whole resort.
[Libby] This tradition of Cheerio
was built around games.
There was a tennis tournament for the adults.
There were Olympic games for the kids.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们会进行奥林匹克比赛

translation.en: There was a gunny sack race,
there was a running race,
there was an obstacle course, carry an egg on a spoon.
translation.zh: ‎还有障碍赛 用勺子举着鸡蛋

translation.en: Nothing fancy, but definitely competitive.
translation.zh: ‎都很朴实无华 但又很有竞争性

translation.en: Oh, no.
Almost.
[director] Bill knew that the best and brightest engineers
translation.zh: ‎比尔知道 最聪明的顶尖工程师

translation.en: are too often focused on well-funded projects
translation.zh: ‎通常只关注资金充足的项目

translation.en: -for business and the military. -[droning instrumentals]
So he had to find a way to get them to think about toilets.
translation.zh: ‎所以要想办法 让他们去思考厕所

translation.en: [Libby] At Cheerio...
getting your spot on the podium was really important.
[Kristi] He wanted to win.
[Bill] Through that.
[Libby] My brother happens to be very competitive.
translation.zh: ‎我的弟弟恰好特别争强好胜

translation.en: [Kristi] But I think that competitive thing
got him going.
Nice.
[director] Bill went back to eight universities.
But instead of asking them to present their designs in private...
translation.zh: ‎但不是让他们私下展示他们的设计…

translation.en: -he had another idea. -[cheerful instrumentals]
[news anchor] The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation
translation.zh:
‎比尔及梅琳达盖茨基金会
‎提出一项竞赛

translation.en: is leading a competition to invent a new toilet that doesn't--
translation.zh:
‎比尔及梅琳达盖茨基金会
‎提出一项竞赛 ‎发明一种厕所 不会…

translation.en: [news anchor 2] From technology to toilets, Bill Gates and his wife--
translation.zh: ‎从技术到厕所 比尔盖茨和他的夫人…

translation.en: [news anchor 3] This wasn't a day for your everyday throne.
translation.zh: ‎今天不是考虑日常马桶的日子

translation.en: [news anchor 4] Microsoft mogul Bill Gates is looking for ways
translation.zh:
‎微软大亨比尔盖茨
‎正在世界各地寻找方法

translation.en: to flush out contaminated drinking water around the world.
[news anchor 5] Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation is offering nearly seven million dollars--
translation.zh:
‎比尔及梅琳达盖茨基金会
‎出价近700万美元

translation.en: [news anchor 6] All entrants must operate without running water, electricity,
translation.zh:
‎参赛者必须
‎在没有水、电力或化粪池的情况下

translation.en: or a septic system.
The foundation expects to use prototypes within the next--
translation.zh: ‎基金会希望能尽快进行试用…

translation.en: [news anchor 7] Prototypes include a toilet that uses microwave energy
translation.zh: ‎模型包括一种利用微波能量

translation.en: to turn human waste into electricity--
translation.zh: ‎将人类排泄物转化为电能的马桶

translation.en: [news anchor 8] Some bottles turn urine into water for flushing
translation.zh: ‎有些瓶子能把尿液变成水 用来冲厕

translation.en: or used insects to eat it.
The maggot is not a very choosy thing when it comes to what it wants to eat.
translation.zh: ‎蛆在吃东西的时候 不是很挑剔

translation.en: [director] Even Bill was amazed by just how audacious these ideas were.
translation.zh:
‎就连比尔也对这些想法的大胆程度
‎感到惊讶

translation.en: But he also knew it would take years for even one to become a reality.
translation.zh:
‎但他也知道
‎这些梦想需要数年时间才能实现

translation.en: And still, every day,
thousands were dying.
[Peter] You have pit latrines in communities,
and eventually they fill up.
Now what do you do with this material?
It's absolutely full of pathogens.
And they have no place to put it.
It's gotta go to a sewer treatment plant.
[director] In other parts of the world, modern sewage treatment simply doesn't exist...
translation.zh:
‎在世界其他地方
‎现代污水处理机制根本不存在…

translation.en: even in urban areas.
[Peter] I traveled and I saw a whole bunch of wastewater treatment plants.
translation.zh:
‎我去过很多地方
‎看到很多污水处理厂

translation.en: None of them were running.
The sewer was just going around them.
They build them but they can't afford to run them.
translation.zh: ‎他们建好污水厂 却无力运行

translation.en: [director] In Dakar, most human waste pours into canals
translation.zh:
‎在达喀尔
‎大多数人的排泄物都倾倒在运河里

translation.en: that flow directly into the Hann Bay.
There, infectious diseases spread at alarming rates.
translation.zh: ‎在那里 传染病的传播速度十分惊人

translation.en: Just as Bill asked Doulaye to help him reinvent the toilet,
translation.zh: ‎在比尔请杜莱帮他改造马桶时

translation.en: he wondered if Peter could help invent a new treatment plant.
translation.zh:
‎他想知道
‎彼得能否帮他发明一种新的处理厂

translation.en: One that doesn't waste water,
or require a lot of energy.
I was a little bit discouraged at first because...
translation.zh: ‎一开始我有点泄气 因为…

translation.en: [stammers] I couldn't think of a technical solution.
translation.zh: ‎我想不到一种技术解决方案

translation.en: A lot of people were looking at filtration.
They were like, "I gotta filter this somehow."
translation.zh: ‎他们觉得 要想办法进行过滤

translation.en: And in my view, you can't filter something
translation.zh: ‎但我看来 每次都截然不同的东西

translation.en: that's so radically different every time.
[Peter] So this is, uh, sewer sludge.
What do you think's growing in there?
Tomatoes.
You know why?
Because people eat tomatoes.
And the seeds go through the person
and they end up here.
Looks like it's pretty dry.
[Peter] Believe it or not, there's actually a lot of really good stuff in...  in shit.
translation.zh:
‎无论你是否相信
‎粪便里面有不少好东西呢

translation.en: There's a lot of water.
And so I started looking at it, saying,
"I can boil it."
[director] Bill and Peter knew that boiling poop would generate steam,
translation.zh:
‎比尔和彼得知道
‎加热粪便可以产生蒸汽

translation.en: -and that steam generates energy... -[gears clicking]
...and energy is necessary to power a sewage system.
But what if a treatment center could use poop to power itself forever?
translation.zh:
‎但如果处理中心
‎可以永远使用粪便来提供动力呢？

translation.en: "And just maybe," they asked...
"could that steam produce clean, drinkable water?"
translation.zh: ‎“蒸汽能够产生干净的饮用水呢？”

translation.en: [director] So, by the time you were 12, things got really bad with your mother, right?
translation.zh:
‎所以当你12岁时
‎你跟妈妈的关系很不好 是吗？

translation.en: [Bill] Yeah, I definitely gave my mom a hard time
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我让我妈很伤脑筋

translation.en: not following along with what she wanted
and really trying to detach myself.
[director] And what-- So how did you express that frustration?
translation.zh: ‎你是怎么表达自己的沮丧的？

translation.en: [Bill] Oh, just disobedience, disrespect.
I mean, it's kind of embarrassing to think about it...
now.
-[director] In an argument over dinner... -[chair slides]
...Bill shouted at his mother in what he describes today as
translation.zh:
‎比尔对母亲大喊大叫
‎用他今天的话说

translation.en: "Utter, totally sarcastic, smart-ass kid rudeness."
translation.zh: ‎“充满讽刺 自作聪明 粗鲁无礼”

translation.en: In a rare burst of anger, Bill's dad threw a glass of water at Bill's face.
translation.zh:
‎比尔的爸爸罕见地勃然大怒
‎把一杯水泼到比尔脸上

translation.en: [Kristi] They actually got some counseling.
They pretended that it was a whole family problem and we all went. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎他们当作是全家的问题 我们都去了

translation.en: Um, but then it became clear that it was my mother and my brother.
translation.zh:
‎但后来慢慢清楚了
‎是我妈和我弟的问题

translation.en: [Bill] I said to him, "Hey,
I'm at war with my parents.
I don't know if you can help me or not."
And he said, "Well, that's it's not a very fair war.
You're gonna inflict more pain on them
translation.zh: ‎相比于他们给你带来的痛苦

translation.en: than they inflict on you.
And they're really on your side."
So, you know, I'm-- Basically, I had the wrong way of looking at things.
translation.zh: ‎所以是我看问题的角度错了

translation.en: It took him about three months to convince me of that,
translation.zh: ‎他花了大概三个月 让我意识到这些

translation.en: but it was brilliant.
I think it was sorta, "At some point, you've gotta let your mother have her way.
translation.zh:
‎我记得他说
‎或多或少要顺从母亲的意思

translation.en: That's just the way life is and you've gotta let your mother have her way."
translation.zh: ‎生活就是这样 也得顺从母亲一下

translation.en: [Bill] The real question was how
I would do in the real world.
translation.zh: ‎在现实世界中 我该怎么做

translation.en: Pushing up against them where they really cared about me,
translation.zh:
‎在他们关心我的地方
‎对他们施加压力

translation.en: that wasn't the real world.
She was intentional about creating opportunities for him to be social.
translation.zh: ‎她有意为他创造社交的机会

translation.en: I mean, for example,
when my dad would go to American Bar Association meetings,
translation.zh: ‎当我爸去参加美国律师协会的会议时

translation.en: they would have him come
and be a greeter or do something
that forced that engagement.
Even at Cheerio
there were sort of beautifully engineered interactions
translation.zh: ‎也会有一些精心设计的互动

translation.en: between the children and the parents.
translation.zh: ‎让孩子和父母之间进行互动

translation.en: One of the things that the parents would organize is a drawing to see
translation.zh: ‎其中一件事是父母会进行抽签

translation.en: whose house you would go to for dinners.
So you had to learn to follow their rules,
translation.zh: ‎所以要学着遵守他家的规矩

translation.en: eat their food, and socialize.
translation.zh: ‎吃他家的饭菜 然后进行交流

translation.en: [director] So if your parents had left him alone and not forced him to deal in the real world,
translation.zh:
‎如果你的父母让他一个人呆着
‎而不是强迫他在现实世界中做各种事

translation.en: do you think he'd be the same guy?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得他还会是现在这样吗？

translation.en: [stammers] I don't think so.
You don't know, but I don't think so.
translation.zh: ‎谁也不知道 不过我觉得不会

translation.en: I think my parents had a lot to do...
with how he turned out.
[announcer] Please welcome Mr. Bill Gates.
[Melinda] So it's viable they could get it value engineered down.
translation.zh: ‎他们把设计价值降低是可行的

translation.en: It's not out of the realm that they could get it to the price point that we want.
translation.zh: ‎达到我们想要的价格 并非不可能

translation.en: [Doulaye] There critical challenge there is with the heat exchanger,
is the heat recovery.
So we are really looking at the best company in the world
translation.zh: ‎所以我们正在寻找世界上最好的公司

translation.en: who have expertise in that.
Do you see there being just one manufacturer
translation.zh: ‎你觉得只有中国的一家制造商吗？

translation.en: ultimately in China or multiples?
[man] The way they're structured--
[director] Melinda brings...
just a great...
different point of view that makes you more effective.
translation.zh: ‎不同的视角 让你的效率更高

translation.en: [Bill] Yeah, well, she's totally my partner.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 她绝对是我的搭档

translation.en: [director] There's real partners and there's superficial partners.
translation.zh: ‎有真正的搭档 也有表面上的搭档

translation.en: And you chose to make her a real partner.
translation.zh: ‎你选择让她成为了真正的搭档

translation.en: [Bill] No, she's a real partner. 'Cause she is, you know, totally...
translation.zh: ‎她是真正的搭档 ‎因为她在做事方面…

translation.en: equal in how we do these things.
[Melinda] We weren't quite there yet when he left Microsoft, to be frank.
translation.zh:
‎坦白说 他离开微软时
‎我们还没走到那一步

translation.en: 'Cause he'd run the company, right?
translation.zh: ‎因为他要管理公司 对吧？

translation.en: He was the CEO of the company and the chairman of the board.
translation.zh: ‎他是公司的CEO 是董事会主席

translation.en: I knew he was for it,
we just needed to change a few of our ways of working together.
translation.zh: ‎但我们还需要改变一些合作的方式

translation.en: [Mike] It doesn't feel like there's any inequality.
translation.zh: ‎感觉她没有什么不能胜任的

translation.en: You know, even though he's the one that started Microsoft and not her.
translation.zh: ‎即使微软是他建立的 而不是她

translation.en: Like he appreciates everything about her,
as opposed to, like, complaining about her or something.
I've never heard him complain about her.
He's the only person I know who I've never heard complain about his wife.
translation.zh:
‎他是我见过的
‎唯一一个从不抱怨妻子的人

translation.en: [Melinda] I was good at math in high school.
translation.zh: ‎上高中时 我的数学成绩很好

translation.en: My high school teacher decided to go to the head principal
translation.zh:
‎我的高中老师
‎在一次会议上看到苹果电脑时

translation.en: when she saw these Apple computers at a conference.
-[typing on keyboard] -So we started programming in high school.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们在高中就学习编程了

translation.en: Between math and puzzles, which I love both,
translation.zh: ‎数学和解谜 我都很喜欢

translation.en: it was like this whole puzzle, and I just loved it.
translation.zh: ‎编程就像解谜 我特别喜欢

translation.en: [Mike] I started working at Microsoft in 1983,
and in '87, we hired seven MBAs,
translation.zh: ‎1987年 我们雇佣了7位工商管理硕士

translation.en: six guys and her.
And she had gone to Duke and gotten a degree in computer science
translation.zh:
‎她是杜克大学毕业的
‎五年时间拿到计算机科学

translation.en: and an MBA in five years.
So the other people in this "pledge class" of MBA's were all like 26 years old.
She was maybe 22 and a half, right, and she was the only woman.
translation.zh: ‎而她大概22岁半 还是唯一的女人

translation.en: [director] Within a very short time, Melinda was running her own division,
translation.zh:
‎只用了很短时间
‎梅琳达就当上部门领导了

translation.en: overseeing hundreds of people.
[Melinda] In the consumer division,
we were trying to think through the human experience,
translation.zh: ‎我们试图通过人类体验来思考

translation.en: the user experience.
Bill has amazing scientists
and innovative ideas for getting new toilet technology.
translation.zh: ‎以及创新想法 去获得新的厕所技术

translation.en: It will absolute change the developing world.
But if they can't think about
the experience of, a mom is the one who takes her child to the toilet--
The moms tell me in the villages,
"If men can see over the wall, I'm not going in there.
translation.zh:
‎“如果男人能从墙外看到里面
‎我就不会用了

translation.en: It's not safe and it's not private.
If I can't take my child into the little stall with me
translation.zh: ‎如果我不能带着孩子跟我一起

translation.en: it doesn't work, I can't leave the child outside."
translation.zh: ‎那也没法用 我不能把孩子丢在外面”

translation.en: That's where I'm willing to be a bit of grist with Bill. I'll poke him a bit.
Like, "Well, how are you thinking about this piece
translation.zh: ‎比如 “我们要怎么处理这方面

translation.en: and how are you thinking about that?"
We listen and respect each other
and then we come to a common viewpoint, and that's what we take forward.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们会达成一致 继续推进

translation.en: And what are you hoping to get out of the toilet fair
translation.zh: ‎这次中国举办的厕所博览会

translation.en: this time that's gonna happen in China?
At the last one there was a bit of, "We're still in a science mode."
translation.zh: ‎在上一次 我们还处在一种科学模式

translation.en: -Mmm. -[man] Could this work?
[man] Our hope is to show enough momentum that that's no longer the question.
translation.zh:
‎我们希望展现出足够的动力
‎解决这个问题

translation.en: [Doulaye] When you arrive, you will be straight on the stage
translation.zh: ‎你到达时 将直接走上舞台

translation.en: to deliver your keynote.
This is going to be a very big historic moment.
translation.zh: ‎这将是一个非常重要的历史性时刻

translation.en: [man 2] At the top of page three,
underneath the lectern
there is a shelf with the, uh...
the poop prop.
So you'll be standing there and it's...
it's just right under there.
Okay.
[man 3] Can you say a few words for me please?
I'm trying this strange microphone.
You got that?
Thumbs up. Thank you.
There's two bottles of water in the podium that have already been cracked.
translation.zh: ‎讲台上有两瓶水 已经拧开了

translation.en: Do they look different than the feces?
translation.zh: ‎它们看起来跟粪便不一样吧？

translation.en: -[laughing] -They're on the bottom shelf.
[Bill] He didn't get that.
Believe me, that was a--
Do I set 'em there? Because then nobody wants them.
translation.zh:
‎是我把它们放到那的吗？
‎因为没有人想碰的

translation.en: [man 3] So they're on the bottom shelf.
translation.zh: ‎所以放在最下面的架子上了

translation.en: [Bill over mic] And we've been working all these years to fund the early stage research.
translation.zh:
‎这些年来
‎我们一直在为早期研究提供资金

translation.en: Now's the time to take it and drive it to maturity.
translation.zh: ‎现在正是让项目走向成熟的最佳时机

translation.en: [director] Six years after the first toilet fair,
translation.zh: ‎在第一次厕所博览会的六年后

translation.en: the engineers have refined their early prototypes.
translation.zh: ‎工程师们已经改进了他们的早期模型

translation.en: What began as a brainstorm on a whiteboard
translation.zh: ‎我们在白板上进行的头脑风暴

translation.en: had finally come to life.
This toilet utilizes a screw to separate urine from feces.
translation.zh:
‎这个马桶用螺旋装置
‎把尿液和粪便分开

translation.en: Burning the waste generates energy to power the screw.
translation.zh: ‎燃烧废物产生的能量为螺旋装置供能

translation.en: All that's left...
a small pile of ash.
This squat toilet dries then burns waste
translation.zh: ‎这个蹲式厕所可以干燥并燃烧粪便

translation.en: to create heat that disinfects the urine.
And this one is powered by solar panels,
and uses an oxygen composting process.
The by-products: fertilizer and water for flushing.
translation.zh: ‎副产品可以用于肥料和冲水

translation.en: We really do see ourselves on a cusp
of a sanitation revolution.
[director] Many of these toilets require no outside electricity or plumbing.
translation.zh: ‎许多厕所不需要外部电力或管道

translation.en: And they were ready to replace the pit latrine forever.
translation.zh: ‎他们准备永远换掉坑式厕所

translation.en: But the capital cost?
For the time being, about $50,000, uh, US dollars.
translation.zh: ‎就目前而言 大约5万美元

translation.en: The cost of this now is around, uh, 50,000.
[director] For all the progress,
Bill knew that a $50,000 toilet was way out of reach.
translation.zh: ‎别人清楚 5万美元的成本太高了

translation.en: [Bill] This thing's gonna have to cost less than $500.
And right now we're more than ten times greater than that.
[director] The solution:
find a partner in this room to manufacture it and bring the cost down.
translation.zh:
‎在这里找到一个生产商作为合作伙伴
‎将成本降下来

translation.en: [Bill] I brought a little exhibit here.
This is a...
container of human feces.
Inside there could be over 200 million
rotavirus particles,
twenty billion shigella bacteria,
and a hundred thousand parasitic worm eggs.
That's what kids, when they're out playing,
they're being exposed to all the time.
[director] If he failed, it would be seven years of work
translation.zh: ‎如果失败 那么所花的七年时间

translation.en: and 200 million dollars wasted.
translation.zh: ‎以及2亿美元 就付诸东流了

translation.en: [director] As a businessman, what are your blindsides?
translation.zh: ‎作为一个商人 你的弱点是什么？

translation.en: What are the moments that you feel like, "Oh, this is what I'm not so good at"?
Well, innovation-based businesses are the only ones that I bring anything...
translation.zh: ‎只有基于创新的生意 我才…

translation.en: to it all.
[Bill] I like to push the level of risk of doing things
that wouldn't happen
without leadership and vision.
[director] In only 18 months,
Peter and his team were able to build a working prototype
translation.zh: ‎彼得及其团队就已经能够造出模型

translation.en: of a stand-alone treatment plant.
translation.zh: ‎建造出了一个独立的处理厂

translation.en: They called it the Omni Processor.
And the machine worked exactly the way they imagined it would.
translation.zh: ‎处理厂能够完全满足他们最初的想象

translation.en: [Peter] So this is the solution when, you empty pit latrines,
translation.zh: ‎这就是解决方案 清空坑式厕所时

translation.en: and instead of dumping all this stuff in the river,
you bring it to a centralized Omni Processor.
translation.zh: ‎而是集中在欧姆尼处理器里

translation.en: It evaporates the water,
solids go into a fire,
we burn them,
we boil more steam,
and drive a steam engine to make electricity to drive the whole process.
translation.zh: ‎驱动蒸汽发电机 给处理器供电

translation.en: [director] It requires no external power and no outside water.
-[metal clatters] -And in the end, the only byproducts
are electricity, ash,
and clean, drinkable water.
We're, you know, looking at all these water samples
coming out of the Omni Processor.
[Peter] You know where it came from, you can see the pile of shit
translation.zh:
‎你知道那些水是从哪来的
‎你还能看到那些粪便

translation.en: that it came from five minutes ago.
translation.zh: ‎五分钟前 那些水还含在粪便里

translation.en: He just grabs a glass and he takes a look at it
-and boom! Just tastes like water. -[Bill speaks indistinctly]
[director] But building a prototype in just 18 months wasn't enough.
translation.zh: ‎在18个月里 制造出模型 还是不够的

translation.en: Bill pushed Peter to get this machine up and running
translation.zh:
‎比尔催促彼得
‎让他在需要这些处理厂的地方

translation.en: where people needed it.
[Peter] I have access to hundreds of mechanics
and engineers and electricians,
and getting it to run every day
is a piece of cake.
But sending it to Dakar
and getting it up and running--
but to actually do that is kind of a big deal.
[Kristi] Early on at Microsoft,
my mom became sort of his right-hand person.
[Libby] When he bought a house, making sure he actually had a house cleaner,
translation.zh: ‎他买房时 确保他有一名清洁工

translation.en: helping him have a wardrobe
when he was getting a photograph taken for some magazine.
translation.zh: ‎好让他穿着 去给杂志社拍照

translation.en: [Kristi] I think he was very happy with that
'cause as a 25, 26-year-old guy,
he, that was great, "I don't have to worry about all this stuff."
translation.zh: ‎他觉得挺好的 不用操心这些事了

translation.en: She made him be really thoughtful early in his life at Microsoft
translation.zh: ‎在微软工作的早期 她让他意识到

translation.en: about what it meant to be a community contributor and the importance of that.
translation.zh:
‎要去做一名对社区有贡献的人
‎这是很重要的

translation.en: She introduced him back into the community, she,
you know, got him involved in United Way.
She was his guidepost.
I never thought that he, you know, at that point,
translation.zh: ‎在当时 我完全没有想到

translation.en: that he'd get anybody to marry him.
Melinda and my mom got along really well.
translation.zh: ‎梅琳达和我妈的关系非常好

translation.en: I think my mom did a great job of sort of realizing
that she needed to step back a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎她意识到自己需要稍微退一步

translation.en: [director] Do you think he knew how serious her cancer was?
translation.zh: ‎他知道她的癌症有多严重吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
-[somber instrumentals] -[Bill] She was becoming very frail.
It was pretty clear...
she had at most...
a year to live.
[Kristi] He did everything he could and...
he looked into trials
and what the different options were for treatment, and...
it was just a little too early in the progression of cancer research
to really help her.
My mom loved Melinda
and thought that she was a great...
addition to the family and perfect for my brother.
translation.zh: ‎家庭成员 也是一位好伴侣

translation.en: Right around the time that Bill and Melinda were getting married,
she was quite ill.
She died the June after they got married.
translation.zh: ‎她在他们婚后的六月过世的

translation.en: She died of breast cancer.
[director] What was the worst day in your life?
Mmm, like the day my mother died.
[Bill] My mom had been fading quite a bit.
And so I'm driving...
to the house I grew up in.
-And I'm speeding... -[engine revs]
-[police siren whoops] -...and I get pulled over.
-[footsteps approaching] -The officer walks up...
and I was just sobbing.
And I say, "My mom died and I'm going home."
translation.zh: ‎我说“我妈没了 我要回家”

translation.en: Even though we had expected it...
and here it was.
Mom was gone.
[Libby] When things are difficult emotionally,
he goes to his safe space, which is intellect.
translation.zh:
‎他会寻求自己的安全空间
‎也就是智慧

translation.en: It's hard for him to feel pain.
I think it was an extraordinary loss for him.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得对他来说
‎这是一个巨大的损失

translation.en: And I kind of wonder, you know, whether there was some...
some things that were left undone for him.
translation.zh: ‎他有没有什么没完成的愿望

translation.en: She would be so prou--
I mean, it's a shame she's not here
translation.zh: ‎我是说 很遗憾她已经不在了

translation.en: 'cause she would be so proud of him.
translation.zh: ‎不然的话 她会非常替他骄傲的

translation.en: But she...
Yeah. Um...
[stammers] It's a shame she's not here.
translation.zh: ‎她已经不在了 太可惜了

translation.en: [director] If she could see you today, you think she'd be proud of you?
translation.zh:
‎如果她能活到今天
‎她会替你感到骄傲吗？

translation.en: I think so.
She never thought my table manners were perfect.
translation.zh: ‎她一直觉得我的餐桌礼仪不够好

translation.en: I don't think I've, uh...
solved that.
So she'd have, you know, still things that...
uh, she'd encourage me to do better on.
[Kristi] Taking his brain and putting it
in our family with my mom...
pushing him to do the social stuff...
that's all stuff that got him...
sort of to focus his brain...
not just on the learning and the educational part,
but more on the doing part.
[director] Today in Dakar,
the Omni Processor is treating one-third
translation.zh: ‎欧姆尼处理器已经能够处理

translation.en: of the city's fecal sludge...
and providing clean, drinkable water.
[Nicholas] In journalism we tend to cover what happened today.
translation.zh:
‎在新闻业
‎我们倾向于报道今天的重大新闻

translation.en: We're all over a press conference, an explosion.
translation.zh: ‎我们参加发布会 报道爆炸新闻

translation.en: We don't cover things that happen every day.
We tend to miss those stories
about the everyday suffering.
And we miss the story about everyday improvement in living conditions.
translation.zh: ‎也会漠视生活条件日益改善的故事

translation.en: Because things that happen every day
are never quite news.
There's this battle for eyeballs in the journalism world.
translation.zh: ‎在新闻业 大家都想吸引眼球

translation.en: And covering global health is not a way to get eyeballs.
translation.zh: ‎报道全球健康问题 并不够吸引人

translation.en: [Nicholas] This article was quickly forgotten
except that it had a couple of important readers in Seattle.
translation.zh: ‎没想到西雅图有几位很重要的读者

translation.en: [director] In November 2018,
Lixil, one of the world's largest manufacturers,
translation.zh: ‎世界最大的制造商之一 骊住集团

translation.en: announced it would develop one of Bill's toilets.
translation.zh: ‎宣布将建造比尔研发的厕所
